      Subinterfaces of Statement in org.semanticweb.rulewerk.core.model.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataSourceDeclaration
      A declaration for an external data source, which assigns a predicate to a source.
      interface  Fact
      A fact is a positive (non-negated) literal that contains only constants as its terms, but no variables.
      interface  Rule
      Interface for classes representing a rule.

      Removes a list of statements from the knowledge base.
